{"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":2101,"originalJapaneseLine":"「まあ……さっさと治れ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well... get well quickly."},{"lineNumber":2102,"originalJapaneseLine":"　でないと俺が困る」","translatedEnglishLine":"Otherwise, I'll be in trouble.\""},{"lineNumber":2103,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふふ…………そう、ですね……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hehe... yes, that's true...\""},{"lineNumber":2104,"originalJapaneseLine":"「どっかの誰かは知らんがな。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I don't care about some random person,"},{"lineNumber":2105,"originalJapaneseLine":"　俺はそいつとは違う。治ったらセックスだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"I'm different from them. Once you get better, it's sex.\""},{"lineNumber":2106,"originalJapaneseLine":"キャロリの目が、少し丸くなる。","translatedEnglishLine":"Carol's eyes became a little round."},{"lineNumber":2107,"originalJapaneseLine":"同時に、意識が少し覚醒したようだった。","translatedEnglishLine":"At the same time, her consciousness seemed to awaken a little."},{"lineNumber":2108,"originalJapaneseLine":"「もぉ……ランスさんは……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Geez... Rance-san..."},{"lineNumber":2109,"originalJapaneseLine":"　少しくらい、思い出に浸ろうと思ったのに」","translatedEnglishLine":"I was thinking of indulging in memories a little.\""},{"lineNumber":2110,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そういうのは年寄りになってからやるもんだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Those kinds of things should be done when you're old.\""},{"lineNumber":2111,"originalJapaneseLine":"「んっ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Mm...\""},{"lineNumber":2112,"originalJapaneseLine":"もう一度キャロリの頭を乱雑に撫でてから、","translatedEnglishLine":"After roughly patting Carol's head once more,"},{"lineNumber":2113,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスは出て行った。","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance left."},{"lineNumber":2114,"originalJapaneseLine":"「年寄りに、なってから、か。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"When I become old, huh."},{"lineNumber":2115,"originalJapaneseLine":"　……ふふ。そうですね…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"... Hehe. Yes, that's right...\""},{"lineNumber":2116,"originalJapaneseLine":"キャロリは薄く微笑んで、","translatedEnglishLine":"Carol smiled faintly,"},{"lineNumber":2117,"originalJapaneseLine":"布団の中で改めて、眠りに就いた。","translatedEnglishLine":"and lay down under the futon to sleep again."},{"lineNumber":2118,"originalJapaneseLine":"ゼス――――","translatedEnglishLine":"Zeth――――"},{"lineNumber":2119,"originalJapaneseLine":"戦況が緩やかになった頃。","translatedEnglishLine":"When the battle situation became calm."},{"lineNumber":2120,"originalJapaneseLine":"人里離れた森の中を歩く、","translatedEnglishLine":"A shadow was walking through a forest far from human habitation."},{"lineNumber":2121,"originalJapaneseLine":"一つの影があった。","translatedEnglishLine":"There was a single silhouette."},{"lineNumber":2122,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はぁ、ふぅ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Haa, huu..."},{"lineNumber":2123,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あ、山菜とか、薬草……","translatedEnglishLine":"Ah, wild plants, medicinal herbs..."},{"lineNumber":2124,"originalJapaneseLine":"　けっこう、伸び放題になってるなぁ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"They're growing quite wildly, huh...\""},

{"lineNumber":2125,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……仕方ないよね。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...It can't be helped."},

{"lineNumber":2126,"originalJapaneseLine":"　もう、誰も……住んでないんだし」","translatedEnglishLine":"No one lives here anymore."},

{"lineNumber":2127,"originalJapaneseLine":"荷物にならない程度に採集して、","translatedEnglishLine":"She gathered just enough without making it a burden,"},

{"lineNumber":2128,"originalJapaneseLine":"キャロリは進んでいく。","translatedEnglishLine":"Carol moved forward."},

{"lineNumber":2129,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はー……朽ちちゃってるなあ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Haa... it's all rotted away...\""},

{"lineNumber":2130,"originalJapaneseLine":"緑の里。","translatedEnglishLine":"The Green Village."},

{"lineNumber":2131,"originalJapaneseLine":"かつて緑化病と呼ばれた、","translatedEnglishLine":"A hidden village where girls who had contracted the ferocious contagious disease once called the 'Greenification Disease'"},

{"lineNumber":2132,"originalJapaneseLine":"凶悪な伝染病に罹患した少女達が隔離された隠れ里。","translatedEnglishLine":"were isolated."},

{"lineNumber":2133,"originalJapaneseLine":"今はもう、生きる者とてない……","translatedEnglishLine":"Now, not a single living person remains..."},

{"lineNumber":2134,"originalJapaneseLine":"森と同化しつつある、廃墟となっていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"It had become ruins merging with the forest."},

{"lineNumber":2135,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ええと、お墓は……あっちだったよね」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Um, the graves... were that way, right?\""},

{"lineNumber":2136,"originalJapaneseLine":"キャロリが歩いていくと――","translatedEnglishLine":"As Carol walked forward—"},

{"lineNumber":2137,"originalJapaneseLine":"「む…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Mm...\""},

{"lineNumber":2138,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、王様……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, Your Majesty...\""},

{"lineNumber":2139,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あぁ……君はここの者だったな……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah... you were one of those from here...\""},

{"lineNumber":2140,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はい。私……幸運でした。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes. I... was lucky."},

{"lineNumber":2141,"originalJapaneseLine":"　私だけ、偶然助かって……","translatedEnglishLine":"Only I survived by chance..."},

{"lineNumber":2142,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ほんとに、幸運で、っ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Truly, I was fortunate..."},

{"lineNumber":2143,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"............\""},

{"lineNumber":2144,"originalJapaneseLine":"ガンジーが、墓標への道を空ける。","translatedEnglishLine":"Ganji stepped aside, clearing the path to the gravestones."},

{"lineNumber":2145,"originalJapaneseLine":"それに促されて、キャロリは涙を拭って歩き出す。","translatedEnglishLine":"Prompted by this, Carol wiped her tears and began walking."},

{"lineNumber":2146,"originalJapaneseLine":"「私たちは、何も――――","translatedEnglishLine":"\"We did nothing—"},

{"lineNumber":2147,"originalJapaneseLine":"　治すことも、助ける事も出来なかった。","translatedEnglishLine":"We could neither cure nor help."},

{"lineNumber":2148,"originalJapaneseLine":"　謝らせて欲しい……というのは、卑怯かな……」","translatedEnglishLine":"I wonder if it's cowardly to want to apologize..."},

{"lineNumber":2149,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……いいえ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...No."},

{"lineNumber":2150,"originalJapaneseLine":"　王様が援助していてくれなかったら、","translatedEnglishLine":"If Your Majesty hadn't provided aid,"},

{"lineNumber":2151,"originalJapaneseLine":"　私たち……もっと、悲惨でした」","translatedEnglishLine":"We... would have been in even worse misery."},

{"lineNumber":2152,"originalJapaneseLine":"ひとつひとつ、墓に手を合わせる。","translatedEnglishLine":"She clasped her hands at each grave one by one."},

{"lineNumber":2153,"originalJapaneseLine":"「王様。私……ずっとずっと、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Your Majesty. I... forever and ever,"},

{"lineNumber":2154,"originalJapaneseLine":"　忘れないでいようと思うんです」","translatedEnglishLine":"intend to not forget."},

{"lineNumber":2155,"originalJapaneseLine":"キャロリはまた目元を拭って、少し笑った。","translatedEnglishLine":"Carol wiped her eyes again and smiled slightly."},

{"lineNumber":2156,"originalJapaneseLine":"「………………それは、大丈夫かね」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Is that really okay?"},

{"lineNumber":2157,"originalJapaneseLine":"「怒り続けるって……すごく大変なんですよね。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Continuing to stay angry... is really difficult, isn't it?"},

{"lineNumber":2158,"originalJapaneseLine":"　私……弱くて。それができないかもしれない」","translatedEnglishLine":"I'm... weak. I might not be able to do that."},

{"lineNumber":2159,"originalJapaneseLine":"「怒るのも……哀しいのも。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Being angry... and being sad,"},

{"lineNumber":2160,"originalJapaneseLine":"　いつか、消えてしまうのかもしれない。","translatedEnglishLine":"may someday disappear.\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まあ……さっさと治れ。
でないと俺が困る」
「ふふ…………そう、ですね……」
「どっかの誰かは知らんがな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I don't care about some random person,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺はそいつとは違う。治ったらセックスだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm different from them. Once you get better, it's sex."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: キャロリの目が、少し丸くなる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Carol's eyes became a little round.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 同時に、意識が少し覚醒したようだった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At the same time, her consciousness seemed to awaken a little.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「もぉ……ランスさんは……
少しくらい、思い出に浸ろうと思ったのに」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I was thinking of indulging in memories a little."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そういうのは年寄りになってからやるもんだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Those kinds of things should be done when you're old."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もう一度キャロリの頭を乱雑に撫でてから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After roughly patting Carol's head once more,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは出て行った。
「年寄りに、なってから、か。
……ふふ。そうですね…………」
キャロリは薄く微笑んで、
布団の中で改めて、眠りに就いた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and lay down under the futon to sleep again.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦況が緩やかになった頃。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When the battle situation became calm.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人里離れた森の中を歩く、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A shadow was walking through a forest far from human habitation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一つの影があった。
「はぁ、ふぅ……
あ、山菜とか、薬草……
けっこう、伸び放題になってるなぁ……」
「……仕方ないよね。
もう、誰も……住んでないんだし」
荷物にならない程度に採集して、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She gathered just enough without making it a burden,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: キャロリは進んでいく。
「はー……朽ちちゃってるなあ……」
緑の里。
かつて緑化病と呼ばれた、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A hidden village where girls who had contracted the ferocious contagious disease once called the 'Greenification Disease'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 凶悪な伝染病に罹患した少女達が隔離された隠れ里。
今はもう、生きる者とてない……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Now, not a single living person remains...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 森と同化しつつある、廃墟となっていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It had become ruins merging with the forest.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ええと、お墓は……あっちだったよね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Um, the graves... were that way, right?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: キャロリが歩いていくと――
「あぁ……君はここの者だったな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah... you were one of those from here..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はい。私……幸運でした。
私だけ、偶然助かって……
ほんとに、幸運で、っ……」
ガンジーが、墓標への道を空ける。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ganji stepped aside, clearing the path to the gravestones.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それに促されて、キャロリは涙を拭って歩き出す。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Prompted by this, Carol wiped her tears and began walking.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「私たちは、何も――――
治すことも、助ける事も出来なかった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We could neither cure nor help.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 謝らせて欲しい……というのは、卑怯かな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I wonder if it's cowardly to want to apologize...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……いいえ。
王様が援助していてくれなかったら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If Your Majesty hadn't provided aid,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私たち……もっと、悲惨でした」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We... would have been in even worse misery.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ひとつひとつ、墓に手を合わせる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She clasped her hands at each grave one by one.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「王様。私……ずっとずっと、
忘れないでいようと思うんです」
キャロリはまた目元を拭って、少し笑った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Carol wiped her eyes again and smiled slightly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「………………それは、大丈夫かね」
「怒り続けるって……すごく大変なんですよね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Continuing to stay angry... is really difficult, isn't it?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私……弱くて。それができないかもしれない」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm... weak. I might not be able to do that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「怒るのも……哀しいのも。
いつか、消えてしまうのかもしれない。

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

output_text:

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I wonder if it's cowardly to want to apologize...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……いいえ。
王様が援助していてくれなかったら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If Your Majesty hadn't provided aid,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私たち……もっと、悲惨でした」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We... would have been in even worse misery.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ひとつひとつ、墓に手を合わせる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She clasped her hands at each grave one by one.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「王様。私……ずっとずっと、
忘れないでいようと思うんです」
キャロリはまた目元を拭って、少し笑った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Carol wiped her eyes again and smiled slightly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「………………それは、大丈夫かね」
「怒り続けるって……すごく大変なんですよね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Continuing to stay angry... is really difficult, isn't it?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私……弱くて。それができないかもしれない」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm... weak. I might not be able to do that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「怒るのも……哀しいのも。
いつか、消えてしまうのかもしれない。
